Service.name: Practical Information
Service.description: Information services providing guidance on essential procedures, local services, and navigating life in the host country.

Service.name: Showers
Service.description: Access to shower facilities for individuals in need, particularly refugees and the homeless.

Service.name: Administrative Support
Service.description: Assistance with administrative procedures, including filling out forms and navigating bureaucratic processes.

Service.name: Residency Permit Help
Service.description: Support services assisting with the application and renewal of residency permits.

Service.name: Social Housing Search
Service.description: Assistance in finding and applying for social housing options.

Service.name: LGBTQ Support
Service.description: Specialized support services for LGBTQ individuals, including legal assistance and social services.

Service.name: Sociocultural Activities
Service.description: Activities that promote social interaction and cultural engagement, such as workshops, events, and outings.

Service.name: Women Support
Service.description: Support services specifically tailored to the needs of women, including legal aid, counseling, and health services.

Service.name: Child Support
Service.description: Services aimed at supporting children, including education, health, and social integration.

Service.name: Administrative Help
Service.description: General help with administrative tasks, including document preparation and communication with authorities.

Service.name: Family Links Restoration
Service.description: Services that help restore contact between family members separated by conflict, migration, or disaster.

Service.name: Vulnerable Family Support
Service.description: Support services for families in vulnerable situations, including those separated by borders.

Service.name: Domiciliation Services
Service.description: Address services for those without a permanent residence, often required for accessing social services.

Service.name: Bag Storage Services
Service.description: Services providing secure storage for personal belongings, particularly for homeless individuals.

Service.name: Housing Information
Service.description: Provision of information about housing options, rights, and regulations.

Service.name: Housing Advice
Service.description: Advice and guidance on housing-related issues, including tenancy rights and application processes.

Service.name: Housing Application Help
Service.description: Assistance with the process of applying for housing, including documentation and form completion.

Service.name: French Lessons
Service.description: Language classes aimed at helping non-French speakers learn the language for better integration.

Service.name: Dinner Services
Service.description: Provision of evening meals to individuals in need, often as part of a larger support program.

Service.name: Breakfast Services
Service.description: Provision of morning meals, typically offered to homeless or vulnerable populations.

Service.name: Food Services
Service.description: General food provision services, including meal distribution and food aid.

Service.name: Lunch Services
Service.description: Provision of midday meals to individuals in need.

Service.name: Meal Services
Service.description: Comprehensive services providing meals throughout the day to those in need.

Service.name: Emergency Accommodation
Service.description: Temporary housing solutions provided in crisis situations to individuals or families.

Service.name: Cultural Outings
Service.description: Organized trips to cultural events and locations, promoting social integration and cultural awareness.

Service.name: Football Training
Service.description: Training sessions and activities centered around playing football, often used as a tool for social integration.

Service.name: Sports Activities
Service.description: Physical activities, including team sports and individual exercise, provided as part of social programs.

Service.name: Football Sessions
Service.description: Scheduled football games and practices, often open to the community.

Service.name: Yoga Sessions
Service.description: Yoga classes offered to promote physical and mental well-being.

Service.name: Job Support
Service.description: Assistance with job searching, applications, and training to improve employability.

Service.name: Medical Consultations
Service.description: Health check-ups and consultations provided by medical professionals.

Service.name: Workshops
Service.description: Educational or skill-building sessions offered to groups or individuals.

Service.name: Professional Support
Service.description: Services offering career guidance, skill development, and job placement assistance.

Service.name: Job Coaching
Service.description: Personalized support and mentoring to help individuals achieve their career goals.

Service.name: French Courses
Service.description: Structured classes aimed at teaching French language skills.

Service.name: Computer Skills Training
Service.description: Training programs designed to improve digital literacy and technical skills.

Service.name: Socioprofessional Support
Service.description: Services that combine social and professional assistance, aimed at improving overall well-being and employment prospects.

Service.name: Immersion Stays
Service.description: Programs that offer immersive experiences to help individuals integrate into a new culture or environment.

Service.name: Technology Training
Service.description: Programs focused on teaching technical skills related to information technology and digital tools.

Service.name: Digital Profession Training
Service.description: Training programs designed to prepare individuals for careers in the digital and tech industries.

Service.name: Food Aid
Service.description: Distribution of food supplies to individuals and families in need.
